§ 2131. Reference to chapter 1606 Provisions of law relating to educational assistance for members of the Selected Reserve under the Montgomery GI Bill program are set forth in chapter 1606 of this title (beginning with section 16131). (Added Pub. L. 103–337, div. A, title XVI, § 1663(b)(7), Oct. 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 3007.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsPrior section 2131 was renumbered section 16131 of this title.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Dec. 1, 1994, except as otherwise provided, see section 1691 of Pub. L. 103–337, set out as a note under section 10001 of this title.
